title: Ben & Jerry's fans can get free tub floaty to enjoy ice cream in the bath
text:

There's nothing quite like a relaxing soak in the bath at the end of a long day.

And one thing that makes the whole experience even better, is a relax in the bath with your favourite snack.

We've recently discovered that you can buy a cup holder for your wine for the bath, and now Ben & Jerry's have come up with a hilarious way for you to enjoy your favourite tub of ice cream.

The ice cream giants have created a must-have accessory for foodies, called the Tub Floaty.

(Image: PR Handout - Free to use)

The product is an inflatable ring that will allow your ice cream to bob along next to you and is complete with a storage slot for the all-important spoon.

The bath time invention has been created to celebrate the new range of Ben & Jerry's Moo-phoria ice cream which is lighter than their regular stuff.

Collectors will have to act fast if they want to get their hands on the quirky item though, as they're only available from two places for a limited time.

The first place is a landing page, which is open now and where you are asked to submit your details. Winners will be randomly selected and a free tub floaty will sail its way to their doorstep.

(Image: PR Handout - Free to use)

Otherwise, from October 28, fans will be given a free floaty (while stocks last) when purchasing a scoop of Moo-phoria ice cream from the Soho Scoop Shop.

One lucky ice cream fan will also be awarded an added bonus of a Ben & Jerry's 'Inside Scoop' card included within their Tub Floaty package - which gives the holder unlimited chunks and swirls from the Soho Scoop Shop for a whole year.

Tsega Abate, Flavour Guru at Ben & Jerry’s said: "Our Moo-phoria range is so light it can almost float… So we decided to help it along by creating the Tub Floaty!

"You know that dream you keep having where you’re floating face up in the serene waters of your local bathtub whilst also simultaneously spooning into deLIGHTfully chunky ice cream as puppies start to fall softly from the skies? Well this is it, minus the puppies. Now you and your tubs can both float merrily alongside one another in an ice cream-filled haze!"
description: Ice cream lovers can now easily enjoy a scoop or two of their favourite ice cream in the bath thanks to Ben & Jerry
